nodes.text: During the time of the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems carried out an attack on Aq Vetina, a settlement of humans. The civilians of the settlement were slaughtered by the droid forces of the Separatists, including B2-series super battle droids and HMP droid gunships. During the attack, a number of Mandalorian warriors of Death Watch intervened, fighting back against the battle droids. The young Din Djarin, whose parents were killed in the attack, was rescued by a Mandalorian warrior and taken in as a foundling.
